#summary Introduction

= SaBot and its ACTuator control board =

SaBot (ScAlable RoBOT) is an experimental platform developed from the Laboratory of Intelligent Robotics and Automation (LIRA)
of the University of Ferrara (Italy).

The design of the robot started from scratch, with the aim to experience all the issues and learn all the lessons related to a full
"mechatronic design".
